**# <a:BASEGEM:1319088333145641091>  BASE MIGRATION INCOMING <a:BASEGEM:1319088333145641091> ** @everyone

<a:gotchiFireball:857490544762683422>  After many months of work, we are finally ready to migrate Aavegotchi from Polygon to Base! 

## How it will work

ü¶∫  In order to ensure the security and integrity of the migration, **we will first be pausing all interactions and transfers** of the following assets, beginning Monday morning EST (exact time TBD):
- Aavegotchis
- FAKE Gotchis
- Wearables
- Forge Assets

These assets will remained paused on Polygon following the migration, and unpaused on Base once they have been cloned. 

The following assets will not be affected during this deployment (but coming shortly):
- REALM Parcels
- Installations
- Tiles
- Alchemica / GLTR

These items will remain tradable in the Baazaar on Polygon until they are migrated to Base. 

## What you need to know

**- The migration should take around 24-48hrs to complete. **

- The majority of users won't have to do anything during this migration. 

- All assets in smart contracts and Gnosis Safes will automatically be sent to new Safes on Base deployed by us but controlled by the original signers. Smart contracts without owners will have their assets temporarily held in custody until we can determine the owner. 

We will publish a list of these contracts during the migration. 

**- Do I still need to pet my gotchi? **Once the snapshot on Polygon has been taken, you won't need to pet your Aavegotchis **until they are live on Base. ** Then, normally petting should resume in order to preserve your kinship. 

## Where can I follow updates? 

I'll continue to post major announcements here in the announcement channel. You can also check the <#1396476357285908582> for status updates as we work through the deployment. 

**The whole Pixelcraft Studios team is excited (and nervous) for this major deployment. Please wish us luck and let's get LOUD on socials (X, Farcaster, BaseApp) throughout this period! <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618> **

**# <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618>  UPDATE ON AAVEGOTCHI CONTRACT PAUSING ** @everyone

In preparation for our upcoming migration to Base, we have proactively paused a few features of the Aavegotchi protocol, to ensure a smooth transition. 

**These features are:**

- Publishing new FAKE Gotchi art
- Creating new GBM Auctions
- Upgrading Installations on your REALM Parcels*
- Forging new Wearables with Schematics. *

* An important caveat: *Forging and Upgrading with maxed out GLTR is still functional.* You can bypass the pausing by spending the required amount of GLTR to immediately confirm your forging and upgrades. 

## Next Steps

We are nearing completion of cloning all of the Aavegotchi contracts and assets onto Base Sepolia. Once this process is finished, we will share a special link to the dapp to check your assets and flag anything that is incorrect.

**Finally, once this testing period has concluded, the official migration to Base will begin!**

# <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618> **NEW DAPP UPDATE** @everyone

## üëë  Outfit Manager has arrived!

Originally known as "Wearable Configs" and commissioned by the DAO in AGIP135, the Outfit Manager (created by <@276081752236097536> and <@829312065437040730>)  lets you create and save different outfits for your Aavegotchis, making it a breeze to easily switch between different builds. 

To access the Outfit Manager, simply visit your Aavegotchi's "Equip" page and click Outfit Manager!

## <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618>  Announcements Page

A new Announcements page is now live on the dapp. This page contains changelogs from the dapp, as well as minor and major announcements related to Aavegotchi. 

Whenever a new announcement is added, a small üî¥  will appear next to the Announcement text, indicating that there's something for you to check! 

## üìä  Activity Page Improvements

We've added more information to the Activity page on mobile, helping you keep up to date with all the latest gotchi sales in the baazaar and auction house. 

--- 

Have feature requests or want to report a bug? Please leave comments in the <#947149173369765948> for our team to check. 

**Have a great gotchi weekend frens!** <:Pixelcraft:995358122392703026>

# <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618> **BASE MIGRATION IS HEATING UP** @everyone

Here are some of the latest updates from Pixelcraft Studios as we near the Base Migration window. 

## ‚è∏Ô∏è  Pausing of Certain Features

In preparation for the upcoming Base Migration, creation of new Auctions, new Forging, Parcel Upgrades, and FAKE Gotchis will be paused, beginning May 2nd. 

This is a necessary step to ensure that no in-flight data gets lost during the migration process. 

**All in-flight Forging and Parcel Upgrades will be confirmed and excuted on Base as part of the migration.**

## <a:BASEGEM:1319088333145641091>  MIgration Testing Incoming

We are ramping up onchain deployment on Base Sepolia and will soon invite you to help us do final testing of your assets, ahead of the final migration deployment. 

The estimated final migration date is May 21st, although this may get pushed back if any major unexpected issues arise during final testing. 

## <a:GEIST:1274378748552282182>  Geist Wind-down Update

With GOTCHI Points Szn1 concluded, we are now finalizing the wind-down of Geist at the end of this month. 

All remaining GHST and USDC on the chain will automatically be airdropped to you once the bridges are disabled. 

**GHST will be sent on Base, and USDC will be sent on Polygon.**

You are also welcome to bridge your funds back anytime before the winddown is complete. 

## <a:gotchiverse:902964886122950706>  Gotchiverse2D Sunsetting

Beginning May 2nd, Gotchiverse2D will officially be sunset. 

The full migration to Base will continue with all Gotchiverse activity being unified on one product: Gotchiverse 3D aka gv3d!

Our three-dimensional home offers maintains all core functionality like farming and build mode while also delivering new features 2D never had.

For more details, please see [this](https://discord.com/channels/732491344970383370/1320055146281041951/1365328334258438184) post by gldnxross. 

## <:gotchitoken:1306274223177601114>  GOTCHI Points Szn2 Update

The discussion for GOTCHI Points Szn2 has been great so far, and we encourage everyone to voice your thoughts about what you would like to see as we launch GOTCHI Points Szn2 on Base. Let's continue the convo in <#1361704433703981116> 

-- 

We are nearing the beginning of a new, exciting chapter of Aavegotchi. Thank you all for your patience and support during this time of transition. 

**We'll see you all soon on the other side!**

<a:gotchiCoderdan:807047451906277394> <a:gotchiGldnxross:807047341886537740> <a:gotchiXIBOT:807115692473188412> <a:gotchiLove:830568810493902868> <a:gotchigang:804904107844042762>

# <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618> **TWO NEW FEATURES IN THE DAPP!** @everyone

## 3D Wearables are HERE!:

All list views (Baazaar, Auction House, User Inventory, etc.) now support 3D wearables. Hovering over a wearable will cause it to rotate, providing a 360¬∞ view!

Prefer the 2D Art? A new setting in Settings => Appearance allows you to toggle the "Show Asset in 3D" option, located below the light/dark mode toggle.

Aavegotchis coming soon‚Ñ¢Ô∏è! 

## FAKE Gotchis now stack in your inventory

Own multiple IDs of the same FakeGotchi?  Now they will be grouped under a single card. Clicking on the card will display all FakeGotchis of the same asset, showing whether each is listed in the Baazaar.

## NextJS Version Bump + Strict Mode

In preparation for open-sourcing the dapp, we also recently converted the entire dapp to Strict Mode, and bumped the NextJS version from v13 to v15, allowing smoother integration with AI coding. 

If you notice any performance hits, or want to comment on anything dapp-related please help us spot them in <#947149173369765948> as these have been significant refactors!

**Go view the latest changes on aavegotchi.com, and have a great week frens! <a:gotchiLove:830568810493902868> **

# <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618>  **NEW DAPP UPDATE HAS LANDED! @everyone**

## **New Features**

**- Player Profile Customization:** You can now update your Aavegotchi Player Profile image, banner, title, and name directly from the dapp profile page.

**- Accepted Offers in Last Sales:** Accepted offers are now displayed in the ‚ÄúLast Sales‚Äù section, giving you a clearer overview of recent transactions.

**-Gotchi Action Buttons in User Page Drilldown: **No more long, yucky menu to interact with your gotchi. All actions are now available via a new Gotchi Action button, making navigation and interactions smoother than ever.

## **Improvements & Fixes**

- **Gotchi Points Page Activity Tab:** Keep better track of winnings from the spinning wheel with the brand-new activity tab.
- **Gotchi Spirit Points Display Fix: **Resolved an issue where Gotchi Points weren‚Äôt showing correctly in the Aavegotchi drilldown.
- **Badges Page Bug:** Fixed a bug preventing badges from displaying properly. Your badges should now shine in all their glory.
- **Parcel Drilldown Enhancements: **Addressed issues with installations and tiles in the parcel drilldown.
- **Improved the accuracy of input fields:** All input fields now use a unified American number format.

Enjoy the updated features and improved performance, and as always, let us know in <#947149173369765948> if you have any feedback!

This proposal entails:

<a:GEIST:1274378748552282182> Sunsetting our L3 Geist

# <a:gotchiMegaphone:846410142718230618> <:GeistVerified:1296891925663842354> **GEIST ID DELEGATION IS LIVE!** @everyone

Many members of the community noted that their GeistID was held by a cold/HW wallet, while much of their gaming activity happened in a separate wallet. 

To reduce friction and enable a smoother Geist experience, we have launched a "Pair Geist ID" feature that allows you to link one additional wallet to your Geist ID onchain. 

Smart contracts such as the GOTCHI Wheel now accept either Geist ID holders, or paired wallets, as long as the Geist ID is active <:GeistVerified:1296891925663842354> 

## How to Pair

To pair a wallet to your Geist ID, visit [this](https://dapp.aavegotchi.com/settings?p=membership) page in Settings, connected with your Geist ID address, and pair your wallet. 

**IMPORTANT: To prevent abuse of this pairing system, only **one** wallet may be paired to each Geist ID, and changes can only be made once every ninety (90) days!**

*Note: This feature does not replace the read-only wallet linking that we are also working on, powered by Thirdweb.*

If you have any issues, feel free to create a <#1077569699065368648> and our mods will help you out. **Never trust anyone DMing you claiming to be a mod!**

## **GL on the wheel frens! <a:LFG:1290667305243775048> **

hope this is okay to post here, if not please lmk - the next RaidGuild onboarding cohort (season7!) kicks off next week - open to anyone looking to learn about how our service DAO operates, and looking to potentially connect and build with like minded people. It's a great opportunity for those who might be in between gigs (you're not alone! üôå ) as our cohort is an interactive onboarding experience combined with elements of an online hackathon, workshops, paid bounties, and a potential pathway to web3 work. 

Held on our Discord throughout the latter half of October, we'll kickoff with an info sesh next week where you'll get to meet others and get a baseline understanding of what RaidGuild is (tldr: we're a service DAO that provides dev services). Hackathon experience is not required, and while having technical skills (or a handle on AI ü§ñ ) will be highly beneficial - we are open to a diversity of backgrounds & skillsets and will highlight work pathways for non-technical folks as well. 

We're holding this cohort as a run up to Devcon in BKK next month, and hope to potentially meet some of you in IRL as well üôÇ

Timing is everything but if this doesn't work for you - send our form (see RaidGuild twitter) to someone you know that could benefit from the experience! 

We've had many people become working members, start new companies (we have the receipts üé© ) or even find full time jobs through the RaidGuild network. Feel free to @ or DM me with any questions, cheers!
